bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for processing internet payments using the electronic funds transfer network

abstract.p: Embodiments of the invention include a method and system for conducting financial transactions over a payment network. The method may include associating a payment address of an account with an account holder name, the account residing at a financial institution and the associated payment address of the account configured to allow withdrawals by the account holder only and to allow a plurality of deposits to be made at different times. The method further includes freely publishing the payment address and making it available to users of an internet portal or search engine. The method further includes receiving data over a network identifying a deposit to be made to the account, assigning the deposit to the account using the payment address, and notifying the payer of the assignment. At least one directory is used for associating the account holder with the payment address.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METODO Y SISTEMA PARA PROCESAR PAGOS POR INTERNET UTILIZANDO LA RED DE TRANSFERENCIA ELECTRONICA DE FONDOS.

abstract.p: Un sistema y método para efectuar mensajes de acreditacion por transferencia Electronica de Fondos. Los componentes estructurales principales del sistemaincluyen un Procesador de Portal de pago (PPP), una cuenta de Pago a cualquier Persona en Internet (IPA), una Caja de Seguridad Privada Virtual (VPL) y unInformador de Cuenta asociado, las redes EFT existentes, y una tarjeta de efecto para acceder a una cuenta VPL o IPA. El PPP es una aplicacion de software quesuministra un portal seguro para acceder (vincularse) a la Cuenta de Deposito a la vista (DDA) del usuario o a una cuenta IPA y puede combinarse con lafuncionalidad de un tradicional Maletín digital.

Los consumidores utilizan un Maletín mejorado por PPP para transferir fondos a su cuenta, comprar en la red,pagar facturas, pagar a cualquier persona, almacenar comprobantes electronicos e historia de transacciones, y verifica la actividad reciente del Maletínmejorado por PPP. La cuenta IPA es una cuenta para fines especiales con unafuncionalidad limitada para realizar pagos electronicos en la forma de mensajes deacreditacion EFT. La VPL es una cuenta de funciones limitadas para recepcion solamente, para recibir pagos electronicos a través del EFT. El Informador deCuentas es unportal para visualizar la historia de las transacciones y el saldo de las cuentas IPA y VPL, brindar informes de transacciones en línea y entiempo real, y conciliar los registros de cuentas a cobrar/compras contra los registros de pago entrantes delEFT.
Una tarjeta física puede asociarse con unacuenta IPA o VPL, para suministrar la capacidad de débito mediante PIN.

Método para receber pagamentos eletrônicos estabelecendo uma conta de recebimento denominada caixa virtual privada

abstract.p: "MéTODO PARA RECEBER PAGAMENTO ELETRôNICOS ESTABELECENDO UMA CONTA DE RECEBIMENTO DENOMINADA CAIXA VIRTUAL PRIVADA". São providos sistema e método para efetuar mensagens de crédito por Transferência Eletrônica de Fundos. Os principais componentes estruturais do sistema incluem: um Processador de Portal de Pagamento (PPP)
uma Conta de Pagamento para Qualquer Pessoa na Internet (IPA)
uma Caixa Virtual Privada (VPL) e um Informativo de Contas associadas
as redes EFT existentes

e um cartão eletrônico para acessar a conta VPL ou IPA. O PPP é uma aplicação de software que provê um portal seguro para acesso (ligação) tanto à Conta Corrente ou de Poupança Programada (DDA) quanto as contas IPA do usuário, e pode ser combinado com a funcionalidade de uma Carteira digital tradicional.

Os consumidores utilizam uma carteira aperfeiçoada do PPP para prover fundos para sua conta, comprar na rede, pagar contas, pagar alguém, armazenar recibos eletrônicos e histórico de transações, e verificar sua atividade recente da Carteira aperfeiçoada do PPP. A conta IPA é uma conta para propósito especial com funcionalidade limitada para efetuar pagamentos eletrônicos na forma de mensagens de crédito por EFT. A VPL é uma conta limitada de recebimento apenas para receber pagamentos eletrônicos através da EFT. O Informativo de Contas é um portal para visualizar histórico de transações e saldo das contas IPA e VPL, prover relatórios de transação em tempo real on-line, e conciliar registros de pagamentos/contas a receber com registros de pagamento vindo pela EFT.
Um cartão físico pode ser associado à conta IPA ou à conta VPL, a fim de prover capacidade de débito com PIN.

PROCEDE ET SYSTEME PERMETTANT LE TRAITEMENT DE PAIEMENTS PARL'INTERNET UTILISANT UN RESEAU DE TRANSFERT ELECTRONIQUE DE FONDS

abstract.p: A system and method for effectuating Electronic Funds Transfer credit messages. The main structural components of the system include a Payment Portal Processor (PPP), an Internet Pay Anyone (IPA) Account, a Virtual Private Lockbox (VPL) and an associated Account Reporter, the existing EFT networks, and a cash card for accessing a VPL or IP account. The PPP is a software application that provides a secure portal for accessing (linking to ) either the user's Demand Deposit Account (DDA) or an IPA account and can be combined with the functionality of a traditional digital Wallet. Consumers u se a PPP enhanced Wallet to fund their account, shop on the web, pay bills, pay anyone, store electronic receipts and transaction history, and check their recent PPP enhanced Wallet activity.

The IPA account is a special purpose account with limited functionality for making electronic payments in the for m of EFT credit messages. The VPL is a limited function receive only account f or receiving electronic payments through the EFT. The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconcile accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with eitheran IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

METODO Y SISTEMA PARA PROCESAMIENTO DE PAGOS POR INTERNET USANDO LA RED DE TRANSFERENCIA DE FONDOS ELECTRONICOS

abstract.p: Sistema de método para el envió de mensajes de acreditación de transferencias electrónicas de fondos. Los componentes de la estructura principal del sistema incluyen:Puerto procesador de pago, cuenta para pagos por Internet, caja de seguridad virtual privada, un sistema generador de reportes de cuentas asociado a los anteriores, redes tipo EFT y tarjetas de débito para acceso a una cuenta virtual. Incluye una aplicación de soporte lógico que facilita un puerto de acceso a o enlace seguro con la cuenta de depósitos del usuario o con la cuenta para pagos por Internet, la cual puede ser combinada con la funcionalidad del cajero electrónico tradicional.

El usuario utiliza el cajero mejorado para consultar su cuenta, comprar a través de la red, pagar facturas, pagar a terceros, almacenar recibos electrónicos y la historia de sus transacciones, y revisar su actividad reciente en el cajero mejorado. La cuenta es una cuenta de propósito especial con funcionalidad limitada para efectuar pagos electrónicos en forma de mensajes de acreditación. La cuenta virtual está limitada a recibir solamente pagos de recibos electrónicos. El sistema generador de reportes es un puerto que permite consultar la historia de las transacciones y el saldo de las cuentas virtual y de pagos por Internet, funcional en línea, con informes en tiempo real y registros de compras frente a ingresos de pagos.
La tarjeta física puede estar asociada también con las cuentas virtual o de pagos por Internet para proporcionar la opción de funciones de débito.<EMI FILE="00031598_1" ID="1" IMF=JPEG >

B) TRANSMISION DE LA AUTORIZACION DE PAGO A LA INSTITUCION PAGADORA

abstract.p: A system and method for effectuating Electronic Funds Transfer credit messages. The main structural components of the system include a Payment Portal Processor (PPP), an Internet Pay Anyone (IPA) Account, a Virtual Private Lockbox (VPL) and an associated Account Reporter, the existing EFT networks, and a cash card for accessing a VPL or IP account. The PPP is a software application that provides a secure portal for accessing (linking to) either the user's Demand Deposit Account (DDA) or an IPA account and can be combined with the functionality of a traditional digital Wallet. Consumers use a PPP enhanced Wallet to fund their account, shop on the web, pay bills, pay anyone, store electronic receipts and transaction history, and check their recent PPP enhanced Wallet activity.

The IPA account is a special purpose account with limited functionality for making electronic payments in the form of EFT credit messages. The VPL is a limited function receive only account for receiving electronic payments through the EFT. The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconcile accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with either an IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

Un sistema y metodo para efectuar mensajes de credito de Transferencia Electronica de Fondos. Los componentes estructurales principales del sistema incluye un Procesador del Portal de Pagos (PPP), una Cuenta de Pagos a Cualquier Persona o Entidad por Internet (IPA)

una Caja de Bloqueo Virtual Privada (VPL) y un Generador de Estados de Cuenta, las redes EFT existentes, y una tarjeta de efectivo para acceder a la cuenta VPL o IP. El PPP es una aplicacion del programa de computo (software) que proporciona un portal seguro para acceder (enlazarse con), ya sea la Cuenta de Deposito a Solicitud (DDA) o una cuenta IPA y puede ser combinada con la funcionalidad de una Cartera digital tradicional.

Los consumidores usan una Cartera PPP mejorada para depositar fondos en su cuenta, comprar en la web, pagar facturas, pagar a cualquier persona o entidad, almacenar recibos electronicos e historias de transacciones y revisar su actividad reciente en la Cartera PPP mejorada. La cuenta IPA es una cuenta para propositos especiales con funcionalidad limitada para efectuar pagos electronicos en la forma de mensajes de credito EFT. La VPL es una cuenta de recepcion de funcion limitada solo para recibir pagos electronicos a traves de la EFT. El Generador de Estados de Cuenta es un portal para ver la historia y el saldo de las transacciones de las cuentas IPA y VPL, proporciona reportes de transacciones de tiempo real en la linea y para conciliar registros de cuentas por cobrar/compras contra los registros de pagos EFT que se esta recibiendo.
Una tarjeta fisica puede estar asociada con cualquiera de las cuentas IPA o VPL con el fin de proporcionar la capacidad de debito NIP.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METODO Y SISTEMA PARA PROCESAR PAGOS POR INTERNET UTILIZANDO LA RED DE TRANSFERENCIA ELECTRONICA DE FONDOS

abstract.p: DONDE DICHO METODO COMPRENDE: a) GENERAR UNA AUTORIZACION DE PAGO QUE IDENTIFIQUE LA INSTITUCION DEL BENEFICIARIO DEL PAGO, LA CUENTA DE DICHO BENEFICIARIO Y UN IMPORTE DEL PAGO
b) TRANSMITIR LA AUTORIZACION DE PAGO A LA INSTITUCION DEL PAGADOR
c) DEBITAR LA CUENTA DEL PAGADOR POR EL IMPORTE DEL PAGO

d) TRANSMITIR UN MENSAJE DE ACREDITACION, A TRAVES DE UNA RED DE TRANSFERENCIA ELECTRONICA DE FONDOS (EFT), QUE REPRESENTA UNA ACREDITACION POR EL IMPORTE DEL PAGO DESDE LA INSTITUCION DEL PAGADOR A LA INSTITUCION DEL BENEFICIARIO DEL PAGO

Y, e) LA CUENTA DEL BENEFICIARIO DEL PAGO POR EL IMPORTE DEL PAGO, EN RESPUESTA A LA RECEPCION DEL MENSAJE DE ACREDITACION. ADEMAS SE PUEDE USAR UNA TARJETA FISICA, CON UN NUMERO DE IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL, PARA LA CUENTA DEL BENEFICIARIO DEL PAGO.
ADEMAS, SE REFIERE A UN SISTEMA QUE COMPRENDE: i) UN PRIMER PROCESADOR PARA (a) Y (b)
ii) UN SEGUNDO PROCESADOR EN LA INSTITUCION DEL PAGADOR ACOPLADO AL PRIMER PROCESADOR, PARA RECIBIR LA AUTORIZACION DE PAGO Y PARA (d)
iii) UN TERCER PROCESADOR EN LA INSTITUCION DEL BENEFICIARIO DEL PAGO, PARA RECIBIR EL MENSAJE DE ACREDITACION Y ACREDITAR (e)
Y, iv) UNA EFT QUE ACOPLA (ii) Y (iii)

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for processing internet paymentsusing the electronic funds transfer network
Method and system for processing internet payments using the electronic funds transfer network

abstract.p: A method for effectuating electronic payments more specifically for making electronic payments for internet purchases. Upon finding an item which it wishes to purchase on an internet retailer's web site, a consumer using its internet software extracts from the web site a price quote for the proposed purchase along with an identification of the merchant's bank and account number. The customer transmits a payment request message to its own bank over the internet. This payment request message simultaneously requests that the consumer's account be debited for the amount of the price quote and that the payment be made crediting the merchants account at the merchants bank. The consumer's bank generates a payment advice that guarantees the payment. The payment advice is transmitted to the merchant. With guaranteed funding, the merchant can immediately deliver the goods of services to the consumer. The customer's bank credits the merchant's account using the regional ATM network infrastructure.

abstract.p: A system and method for effectuating Electronic Funds Transfer credit messages. The main structural components of the system include a Payment Portal Processor (PPP), an Internet Pay Anyone (IPA) Account, a Virtual Private Lockbox (VPL) and an associated Account Reporter, the existing EFT networks, and a cash card for accessing a VPL or IP account. The PPP is a software application that provides a secure portal for accessing (linking to) either the user's Demand Deposit Account (DDA) or an IPA account and can be combined with the functionality of a traditional digital Wallet. Consumers use a PPP enhanced Wallet to fund their account, shop on the web, pay bills, pay anyone, store electronic receipts and transaction history, and check their recent PPP enhanced Wallet activity. The IPA account is a special purpose account with limited functionality for making electronic payments in the form of EFT credit messages. The VPL is a limited function receive only account for receiving electronic payments through the EFT. The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconciles accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with either an IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Virtual private lock box

abstract.p: Embodiments of the invention include a method and system for effectuating an electronic payment between a payor and a payee using an Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) network. The method is implemented by a system having multiple processors. The payor may hold a payor account at a payor institution and the payee may have a payee account at a payee institution. The method includes generating a payment authorization identifying the payee institution, the payee account, and an amount of the payment and transmitting the payment authorization to the payor institution. The method further includes debiting the payor account by the amount of the payment
transmitting from the payor institution to the payee institution though the EFT network an EFT credit message representing a credit in the amount of the payment
and crediting the payee account in the amount of the payment in response to the receipt of the EFT credit message.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method And System For Processing Internet Payments Using The Electronic Funds Transfer Network

The main structural components of the system include a Payment Portal Processor (PPP), an Internet Pay Anyone (IPA) Account, a Virtual Private Lockbox (VPL) and an associated Account Reporter, the existing EFT networks, and a cash card for accessing a VPL or IP account. The PPP is a software application that provides a secure portal for accessing (linking to) either the user's Demand Deposit Account (DDA) or an IPA account and can be combined with the functionality of a traditional digital Wallet. Consumers use a PPP enhanced Wallet to fund their account, shop on the web, pay bills, pay anyone, store electronic receipts and transaction history, and check their recent PPP enhanced Wallet activity.

The IPA account is a special purpose account with limited functionality for making electronic payments in the form of EFT credit messages. The VPL is a limited function receive only account for receiving electronic payments through the EFT. The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconciles accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with either an IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

abstract.p: Embodiments of the invention include a method and system for effectuating an electronic payment between a payor and a payee using an Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) network. The method is implemented by a system having multiple processors. The payor may hold a payor account at a payor institution and the payee may have a payee account at a payee institution. The method includes generating a payment authorization identifying the payee institution, the payee account, and an amount of the payment and transmitting the payment authorization to the payor institution. The method further includes debiting the payor account by the amount of the payment
transmitting from the payor institution to the payee institution through the EFT network an EFT credit message representing a credit in the amount of the payment
and crediting the payee account in the amount of the payment in response to the receipt of the EFT credit message.

abstract.p: A computer implemented payment processing method and system are provided for facilitating electronic purchase transactions by a purchaser from a merchant. The method implements a payment processing system including at least one computer processor and at least one computer memory and includes multiple steps. The steps include receiving, at the at least one computer processor of the payment processing system, a payment request associated with the electronic purchase transaction, the request including information, but not including confidential financial account numbers.

The method further includes performing authentication to authenticate the purchaser and verification procedures to verify funds available at the payment processing system based on the order information and non-confidential information and determining whether the cash payment can be completed based on the authentication and verification procedures. The method also includes causing, with the at least one computer processor, the cash payment to be released to the merchant in response to a determination that the cash payment can be completed.

abstract.p: Embodiments of the invention include a method and system for conducting financial transactions over a payment network. The method may include associating a payment address of an account with an account holder name, the account residing at a financial institution and the associated payment address of the account configured to allow withdrawals by the account holder only and to allow a plurality of deposits to be made at different times. The method further includes freely publishing the payment address and making it available to users of an internet portal or search engine. The method further includes receiving data over a network identifying a deposit to be made to the account, assigning the deposit to the account using the payment address, and notifying the payer of the assignment on a real time basis. At least one directory is used for associating the account holder with the payment address.

abstract.p: A computer implemented system is provided for processing payments. A server including a computer memory storing a first database including a directory is provided. The directory includes authenticated registrant information comprising authenticated information for a payee, the directory identifying via a publicly available account identifier at least one linked account of said payee. The system also includes a payor computer having access to the directory and a first bank computer linked via a computer network to the server, the first bank computer configured to access payor account information from a payor account at the first bank.

The first bank computer is also configured to receive payment information from the payor computer identifying the payee and to transmit a payment from the payor account at the first bank to the linked payee account located at a second bank without using an intermediary to transfer said payment.

The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconciles accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with either an IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé permettant d'effectuer un transfert électronique de fonds (TEF) au moyen de messages de crédit. L'élément structurel principal du système comprend un portail processeur de paiement (PPP), un compte IPA (Internet Pay Anyone), une boîte postale virtuelle privée (VPL) et un rapporteur de comptes correspondant, les réseaux TEF existants, et une carte de paiement pour accéder aux comptes VPL et IP (Internet Pay). Le PPP est une application logicielle qui fournit un portail sécurisé pour accéder soit avec le compte à vue (DDA) de l'utilisateur, soit avec son compte IPA (c'est-à-dire établir une liaison avec ces comptes), et peut être combiné à la fonctionnalité d'un portefeuille numérique traditionnel.

Les consommateurs utilisent un portefeuille PPP amélioré pour approvisionner leur compte, faire leurs achats sur le web, payer leurs factures, rémunérer une personne, stocker des reçus électroniques et l'historique des opérations, et pour vérifier les activités récentes de leur portefeuille PPP amélioré. Le compte IPA est un compte à usage déterminé dont la fonctionnalité est limitée aux paiements électroniques sous la forme de messages de crédit TEF. Le VPL est un compte à fonctions limitées destiné uniquement à recevoir des paiements électroniques par le biais du TEF.

Le rapporteur de comptes se présente sous la forme d'un portail permettant de visualiser l'historique des transactions et le solde des comptes IPA et VPL, de fournir en ligne, des rapports d'opérations en temps réel, et de rapprocher les créances à recevoir/enregistrements d'achats et les enregistrements de paiement TEF entrants. Les comptes IPA ou VPL peuvent, en outre, être accompagnés d'une carte bancaire pour permettre les débits au moyen d'un code d'identification personnel.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR EFFECTUATING ELECTRONIC PAYMENTS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE PERMETTANT D'EFFECTUER DES PAIEMENTS ELECTRONIQUES

abstract.p: A system and method for effectuating Electronic Funds Transfer credit messages. The main structural components of the system include a Payment Portal Processor (PPP), an Internet Pay Anyone (IPA) Account, a Virtual Private Lockbox (VPL) and an associated Account Reporter, the existing EFT networks, and a cash card for accessing a VPL or IP account. The PPP is a software application that provides a secure portal for accessing (linking to) either the user's Demand Deposit Account (DDA) or an IPA account and can be combined with the functionality of a traditional digital Wallet. Consumers use a PPP enhanced Wallet to fund their account, shop on the web, pay bills, pay anyone, store electronic receipts and transaction history, and check their recent PPP enhanced Wallet activity.

The IPA account is a special purpose account with limited functionality for making electronic payments in the form of EFT credit messages. The VPL is a limited function receive only account for receiving electronic payments through the EFT. The Account Reporter is a portal to view transaction history and balance of IPA and VPL accounts, provide online, real-time transaction reports, and to reconcile accounts receivable/purchase records against incoming EFT payment records. A physical card can be associated with either an IPA or VPL account in order to provide PIN debit capability.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé permettant de traiter des messages de crédit en vue d'un transfert électronique de fonds (TEF). Les composantes structurales principales du système comprennent un processeur de portail de paiement (PPP : Payment Portal Processor), un compte de paiements généraux (IPA :Internet Pay Anyone), une boîte postale privée virtuelle (Virtual Private Lockbox :VPL) et un rapporteur de compte associé. Le PPP est une application logicielle qui fournit un portail sûr pour l'accès, ou la connexion soit au compte à vue (Demand Deposit Account :DDA) de l'utilisateur, soit à un compte IPA et peut être combiné à une fonction portefeuille numérique traditionnelle.

Les consommateurs utilisent un portefeuille amélioré PPP pour financer leur compte, pour faire des achat en ligne, pour payer des factures, effectuer des paiements généraux, mémoriser des récépissés électroniques et des historiques des transactions et consulter l'activité récente du portefeuille amélioré PPP. Le compte IPA est un compte à affectation spécifique, et à fonction limitée permettant de réaliser des paiements électroniques sous forme de messages de crédit TEF. Le VPL est un compte réservé à l'encaissement, à fonction limitée, permettant l'encaissement de paiements électroniques réalisés via le système TEF.

Le rapporteur de compte est un portail permettant de consulter l'historique des transactions et le solde des comptes IPA et VPL, de fournir en ligne des rapports de transaction en temps réel et de comparer les relevés de clients/des achats aux relevés de paiement TEF entrants. Une carte physique comportant une fonction de débit avec NIP peut être associée soit à un compte IPA soit à un compte VPL.
